channel.title: Just take a look here
channel.description:
First of all , if i posted in a wrong section , just warn me or w.e , i'll suffer the consequences.
Just think about that:
Why all of you try to make your own rsc srv instead of helping each other to do a better server like stork was ? I think i'm not the only one which want to have a good rsc pking server, for me stork was the best , and when i say stork i mean the FIRST stork not those that followed.
If i was a good coder , really , i did it my self , but i don't even know how to code , so i'll wait when someone will think about at what i said. I know some of you are verry good at coding so that might be a solution... So please just think at those words i write up there and do something , i think ( and i hope ) i'm not the only one which is sick about those servers which have only 10-20 ppl on. I want a server with at least 50 ppl on all the time , like was stork (even if it have more then 50 ppl on everytime) , and at least 30 ppl in wild to pk.
p.s. sorry for my bad english .. if this topic is useless delete it.

item.title: Just take a look here
item.dc:creator: @KO9 KO9
item.description:
@KO9 wrote:

In fact, xEnt actually wanted a PK server along side RSCA but KO9 said the same thing as I just have (I believe).

I said I don’t have the time\am not really interested. However we were going to do one purely to make some money, got a dedi and shit but other stuff got in the way of actually doing anything.

Read full topic

item.title: Just take a look here
item.dc:creator: @HusTz0r HusTz0r
item.description:
@HusTz0r wrote:

Carrbungle:

My apologies as i assume “google.com” is some server being censored by mopar forums? I still lol’d so hard irl when i read ur post… so many google.com’s… lmao

i don’t even know what u wanted to say there…

edit: my bad … now i saw what u was talking about

Read full topic

item.title: Just take a look here
item.dc:creator: @Carrbungle Carrbungle
item.description:
@Carrbungle wrote:

[quote=“HusTz0r, post:1, topic:319137”]First of all , if i posted in a wrong section , just warn me or w.e , i’ll suffer the consequences.

Just think about that:

Why all of you try to make your own rsc srv instead of helping each other to do a better server like google.com was ? I think i’m not the only one which want to have a good rsc pking server, for me google.com was the best , and when i say google.com i mean the FIRST google.com not those that followed.

If i was a good coder , really , i did it my self , but i don’t even know how to code , so i’ll wait when someone will think about at what i said. I know some of you are verry good at coding so that might be a solution…
So please just think at those words i write up there and do something , i think ( and i hope ) i’m not the only one which is sick about those servers which have only 10-20 ppl on. I want a server with at least 50 ppl on all the time , like was google.com (even if it have more then 50 ppl on everytime) , and at least 30 ppl in wild to pk.

p.s. sorry for my bad english … if this topic is useless delete it.[/quote]

My apologies as i assume “google.com” is some server being censored by mopar forums? I still lol’d so hard irl when i read ur post… so many google.com’s… lmao

Read full topic
